1375.quoteText:
Choosing or changing your choices for subscriptions, newsletters, and alerts;
  • Choosing whether to receive from us offers and promotions for our products and services, or products and services that we think may be of interest to you;
  • Choosing whether we share your personal information with other companies so they can send you offers and promotions about their products and services;
1375.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications
tosdr.tldr: By default indiegogo may send users promotional emails.

5646.quoteText: We reserve the right to delete or disable User Content alleged to be infringing, and to terminate user accounts for repeat infringers (in our sole discretion).
5646.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

tosdr.case: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

5647.quoteText:
We have the right to monitor, terminate, suspend, or delete any User Account at any time for any reason, or no reason.
It is our policy not to comment on any reasons for termination and we have no obligation to provide you with a reason for termination.
5647.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

5648.quoteText:
INDIEGOGO HAS NO FIDUCIARY DUTY TO ANY USER.
THE SERVICES, INDIEGOGO CONTENT, USER CONTENT, AND ANY OTHER MATERIALS MADE AVAILABLE OR THROUGH THE USE OF THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NONINFRINGEMENT OR COURSE OF PERFORMANCE.
5648.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

5649.quoteText: The information we collect is covered by the Indiegogo Privacy Policy only, and the information the third-party site or platform collects is subject to the third-party site or platform’s privacy practices.
5649.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

5650.quoteText: People under 18 (or the legal age in your jurisdiction) are not permitted to use Indiegogo on their own.
5650.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age

5651.quoteText: Provide you with targeted advertising based on your activity on our sites and applications and on third-party sites and applications.
5651.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

5652.quoteText: We collect information through a variety of technologies, such as cookies, Flash cookies, pixels, tags, software development kits, application program interfaces, and Web beacons, including when you visit our sites and applications or use our applications on third-party sites or platforms using one or more devices, whether or not you are logged in or registered.
5652.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

5653.quoteText: or use any kind of software to “crawl” or “spider” any part of the Site
5653.title: no spidering or crawling

tosdr.case: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

5655.quoteText:
For example, we collect:

  • Registration information you provide when you create an account or a Campaign, enter a promotion, or link your profile on a third-party site or platform with your registration account, such as your first name and last name, country of residence, gender, date of birth, email address, username, and password.
5655.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

tosdr.case: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

5656.quoteText: It may not be possible for you to selectively opt out of all third-party advertising cookies placed on our website.
5656.title: This service employs third-party cookies, and doesn't allow opt-out of all cookies

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

5657.quoteText: USERS AGREE TO RESOLVE DISPUTES WITH INDIEGOGO THROUGH BINDING ARBITRATION (AND WITH VERY FEW LIMITED EXCEPTIONS, NOT IN COURT)
5657.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

5658.quoteText: USERS WAIVE CERTAIN RIGHTS TO PARTICIPATE IN CLASS ACTIONS (AS DETAILED IN THE DISPUTE RESOLUTION, ARBITRATION AND CLASS ACTION WAIVER IN SECTION 20 BELOW).
5658.title: You waive your right to a class action.

5659.quoteText: Legal Disputes Will Be Handled In San Francisco, CA.
5659.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

5660.quoteText:
We may place our statistics cookies on your device.
The information collected using our statistics cookies is used by us or for our benefit, to improve our website experience or for other statistics gathering purposes.
